NAME
  ubertooth-debug - command line utility for debugging Ubertooth Zero and Ubertooth One

SYNOPSIS
  ubertooth-debug [options]


OPTIONS
  -h   help
  -r <name>     read the contents of a 16 bit CC2400 register
  -r <number,number,low-high>     read the contents of a 16 bit CC2400 register(s)
  -U<0-7>    set ubertooth device to use
  -v<0-2>    verbosity (default=1) 

AUTHOR
  This manual page was written by Ruben Undheim <ruben.undheim@gmail.com> for the Debian project (and may be used by others).
